t: Description of a Citizen of Zion.
O*pn Lord,*s who may abide in Your tent? Who*ln may dwell on Your holy hill?
He*ln who walks with integrity, and works righteousness, And*ln speaks truth in his heart.
He*ln does not slander with his tongue, Nor*ln does evil to his neighbor, Nor*ln takes up a reproach against his friend;
In*ln whose eyes a reprobate is despised, But*ln who honors those who fear the Lord;*s He*ln swears to his own hurt and does not change;
He*ln does not put out his money at interest, Nor*ln does he take a bribe against the innocent. He*ln who does these things will never be shaken.
